item.title: Has Prithvi Exchange (India) Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Prithvi Exchange (India) Ltd has declared a 15% dividend, with an ex-date of February 9, 2026. Despite recent negative price returns, the company has shown significant long-term growth, particularly over the last 3 to 5 years. Time: Feb 02 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has GAIL (India) Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, GAIL (India) Ltd has declared a dividend of 50%, with an ex-date of February 5, 2026, and a dividend yield of 4.62%. Despite recent negative price returns, the company has shown positive total returns over longer periods. Time: Feb 02 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Bharat Dynamics Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Bharat Dynamics Ltd has declared a dividend of 90%, amounting to ₹0.65 per share, with an ex-date of February 9, 2026. The company has shown strong total returns over various periods, particularly in the long term. Time: Feb 02 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has ASM Technologies Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, ASM Technologies Ltd has declared a dividend of 25% (₹1 per share) with an ex-date of February 11, 2026. The company has demonstrated strong total returns over various periods, particularly impressive over the long term. Time: Feb 02 2026 11:30 PM IST
